Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants containing 'Accepted + Wait' relative to total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Resolved' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' that occur after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' appearing in variants that eventually lead to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' compared to the frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in variants with performance duration above the median cycle time
Percentage of cases where 'Accepted + Wait' appears at least once before 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' occurring directly after 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' among all wait-type activities (including 'Accepted + Wait - User', 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation', 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor')
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of variants containing both 'Accepted + Wait' and 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' executions that are not followed by any further activity within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' grouped by country of execution
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities grouped by the last value of organization country

Name: Percentage of total process duration attributable to waiting periods initiated by 'Accepted + Wait'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases
